description: This file defines a React functional component named TopNav that renders a header with a page title, a menu toggle button, and a theme toggle button, managing theme state and applying theme classes to the document.

methods.name: TopNav({ title = "Home", onMenu })
methods.description: React functional component for rendering the top navigation bar with theme toggling and menu button.

methods.name: toggleTheme
methods.description: Function to toggle the theme between 'light' and 'dark' and update the document's data-theme attribute.
